header-description: This page displays all available information about the user that can be collected on this website.
header-note: Depending on the device, browser, and settings, some information may be incorrect or not collected.
footer-note: All data is collected for demonstration purposes only and is not stored.
tooltip-page-visited: The URL of the current page.
tooltip-time-spent: The time spent on the website since the last page load.
tooltip-last-click: The coordinates of the last click (x, y) on the page. Empty if no click was made since the page was loaded.
tooltip-referrer: The URL of the page that referred to this page, if a redirect occurred.
tooltip-country: The country from which the page is accessed (works without location permission).
tooltip-city: The city based on the IP address. May display the nearest larger city.
tooltip-region: The region (state or province) from which the page is accessed.
tooltip-coordinates: The geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude) of the device's location, if permission was granted.
tooltip-ip: The IP address of the device.
tooltip-connection-type: The type of network connection may not reflect the actual connection due to network infrastructure.
tooltip-user-agent: Compatibility info: Operating System, architecture, rendering engine, browser name.
tooltip-browser: The detected browser based on the user-agent string.
tooltip-os-detected: The detected operating system based on the user-agent or platform data.
tooltip-resolution: The resolution of the browser window (width x height in pixels).
tooltip-os: The operating system of the device.
tooltip-language: The language set in the browser or operating system.
tooltip-battery-status: The current battery and charging status of the device.
tooltip-cpu-cores: The number of logical CPU cores (threads).
tooltip-device-memory: The installed RAM (memory) of the device.
tooltip-storage-status: The available storage space on the device.
tooltip-screen-orientation: The current screen orientation (portrait or landscape).
tooltip-max-touchpoints: The maximum number of simultaneous touch inputs supported by the display.
